title: Panth kit idea
body:
i was thinking of a cool tweak to Pantheons kit. 

If using his w was just a jump (not stun) to target (maybe to allies too) but gave his next ability a different function.

Making his next spear a Troy like distance but is a skill shot

activating his w again is a small damage skill shot dash stun with shield, (magic damage)

And his e is a the classic sparta kick pushing the target a small distance.

Im sure they could make this work

replies.body: Or leave panth because he is fine how he is now
sounds cool, put it on other regions as well so it get noticed more readily
